layanan.title: Diagnos’ Most Popular Services
layanan.description: Diagnos’ most sought-after services, delivering fast, accurate, and reliable healthcare solutions.

card1.title: Women’s Health Package
card1.desc: A dedicated health check package for women, including tests to determine calcium and vitamin D levels in the blood. It also screens for cervical cancer via urine HPV DNA testing.

card2.title: Heart Health Screening
card2.desc: A screening package for risk factors of coronary heart disease. Provides insight into blood glucose, dyslipidemia, liver function, kidney function, and predictors of coronary heart disease.

card3.title: Healthy Senior Checkup Package
card3.desc: Designed for older adults to obtain a comprehensive picture of their health and identify risks such as liver, kidney, and heart disorders.

card4.title: Kidney Health Screening
card4.desc: A package focused on evaluating kidney health and function through laboratory tests. Assesses how well the kidneys filter blood and produce urine, and can detect issues such as elevated uric acid.

card5.title: Allergy Test for Children
card5.desc: An allergy test using a blood sample to detect specific allergens such as foods, mites, fungi, dairy components, and animal dander. Delivers up to 27 allergen insights in a single run.

about.title: About Diagnos
about.body: Diagnos Laboratory is part of BMHS (Bundamedik Healthcare System). We exist to meet public needs with a clear vision and mission. We provide high-quality, reliable, and consistent laboratory services for all Diagnos partners and customers. Our Commitment
about.quote: “Diagnos Laboratory was born out of the expectation for a laboratory that is compliant, comprehensive, and patient-oriented.”

visi.title: Our Vision
visi.body: To become an integrated, high-quality laboratory that meets international standards and serves as a national diagnostic referral center.

body.point1: Provide laboratory services that prioritize accuracy, precision, and speed to strengthen diagnosis.
body.point2: Develop a variety of clinical laboratory tests and panels to meet customer needs.
body.point3: Develop outstanding human resources in knowledge, skills, and behavior.

value.title: Bundamedik Healthcare System Values
value.description: Bundamedik Healthcare System brings modern innovation and integrated services that excel in meeting the comprehensive health needs of families.

card1.title: Compassion
card1.desc: Honest and trustworthy in every action, loyal to professional ethics and business ethics aligned with the organization’s values.

card2.title: Competence
card2.desc: Able to set an example, lead oneself and others, and develop future leaders.

card3.title: Change Agility
card3.desc: Smart and agile in facing every challenge and change.

card4.title: Collaboration
card4.desc: Think openly, behave politely, and communicate ideas effectively to build commitment and good relationships.

card5.title: Create Innovation
card5.desc: Proactively carry out continuous improvement and confidently present new ideas that are creative and innovative.

profile.title: President Director’s Foreword
profile.description: As part of our commitment to delivering the best services, Diagnos consistently upholds quality standards through an integrated management system that includes management responsibility, human resource management, infrastructure and work environment, and periodic equipment testing to ensure the accuracy and reliability of results. Various strategic and innovative initiatives are also continuously pursued to deliver added value—bringing us closer, more convenient, and more affordable for you.

sertifikat.title: Certifications
sertifikat.description: Official accreditations as proof of our commitment to service quality and trust in healthcare.

aboutHero.title: About Us
aboutHero.body: Diagnos Laboratory serves public needs with a clear vision and mission to help build a healthier Indonesia.

komitmen.title: Proof of Our Commitment to Quality
komitmen.description: Our accreditations are a guarantee of healthcare service quality that meets national and international standards.

branchHero.title: Diagnos Laboratory Branches and Clinics Near You in Indonesia
branchHero.body: Diagnos Laboratory strives to provide healthcare services to the people of Indonesia through branches and networks closest to you.

appPromo.title: Unlock Your Health Potential with DNAandMe!
appPromo.body: Download the DNAandMe app now and get personalized genetic insights to make smarter, more accurate health decisions. Easier than ever—bringing you closer to optimal health!

consultHero.title: Doctor Consultation
consultHero.body: An application service built by Diagnos to provide a better experience for doctors in supporting health services for patients.

dnaandme.title: DNAandMe
dnaandme.body: Diagnos—powered by Asa Ren—is a lifestyle and health app that provides genetic testing services for people in Indonesia.

dnaFeatures.heading: Now It’s Easier—All in the Palm of Your Hand
dnaFeatures.subheading: Health services and diagnostic tests are now easier to access from a single place—bringing you comfort and convenience.

report.title: DNA Report
report.body: We offer 21 categories covering nutrition, fitness, health, mental wellness, and diseases. Our DNA results aim to provide your first step toward a better lifestyle.

library.title: Content Library
library.body: Listen to and watch content to accompany your day.

article.title: Articles
article.body: Read the latest news and articles on a wide range of health topics such as fitness, diet, and mental health.

consult.title: Consultation
consult.body: Book a consultation session with our counselors to learn more about your DNA results!

benefit.heading: Benefits of Using DNAandMe
benefit.subheading: With DNAandMe, you gain deeper insights into your health and genetic potential, helping you make more personal and precise medical decisions.

0.title: Deeper Genetic Understanding
0.body: DNAandMe provides in-depth genetic analysis to help you understand health potential, disease risks, and genetic factors that may influence your life—opening the door to earlier prevention.

1.title: Personalized Health Recommendations
1.body: Based on your genetic test results, DNAandMe offers more personalized and specific recommendations so you can manage lifestyle, diet, and medical care according to your body’s unique needs.

2.title: Genetic Disease Risk Detection
2.body: Through DNA analysis, you can learn your potential risk for certain genetic conditions, enabling preventive action or earlier treatment to reduce future health impacts.

3.title: More Targeted Health Guidance
3.body: DNAandMe equips you with more targeted information for medical consultations, making it easier to discuss genetics-based health management steps with your doctor or health professionals.

4.title: Optimize Medical and Health Decisions
4.body: By understanding genetic factors, DNAandMe helps you make smarter, more effective decisions when planning medical care, long-term health management, and choosing what’s best for your body.

layananHero.title: Clinic Services
layananHero.body: Diagnos’ service development is grounded in medical professionalism to support healthcare delivery and provide a better service experience for patients.

vaccine.title: Vaccination
vaccine.body: The vaccination service at Diagnos Healthcare Main Clinic provides optimal protection against various infectious diseases for children, adults, and seniors. With certified medical professionals and assured vaccine quality, the vaccination process is safe, comfortable, and follows medical standards. We provide the following vaccines:
vaccine.imageAlt: Healthcare professional administering a vaccine to a patient

vitamin.title: Vitamin Injection/Infusion
vitamin.body: The vitamin injection/infusion service at Diagnos Healthcare Main Clinic is designed to help meet daily nutritional needs more quickly and effectively—especially for those with busy lifestyles, in recovery, or experiencing prolonged fatigue. Performed safely and promptly by professional medical staff, our multivitamin injections are a practical solution to maintain your body’s vitality and fitness. We provide the following vitamins:

personalMedical.title: Personal Medical Check Up
personalMedical.body: The Personal Medical Check Up service at Diagnos Healthcare Main Clinic offers comprehensive health assessments tailored to individual needs. Results are delivered as a personalized report with medical interpretations and relevant recommendations—helping you understand your condition and take early preventive action. Our Personal Medical Check Up products:

tesLaboratorium.title: Non-Laboratory Tests
tesLaboratorium.body: The Non-Laboratory Test service at Diagnos Healthcare Main Clinic includes various supporting examinations that do not involve lab sample analysis, such as radiology, echocardiography (ECG), ultrasound, treadmill test, spirometry, and audiometry. With modern facilities and professional staff, these services support comprehensive diagnosis and health monitoring.

corporateHero.title: Corporate Health Service
corporateHero.body: Our Corporate Health Service provides comprehensive health solutions for companies, with tailored medical services to improve employee well-being and support productivity in the workplace.

layananKorporasi.title: Corporate Services
layananKorporasi.body: Integrated health services designed to enhance employee productivity and health through preventive, data-driven approaches. Scope of services:

items.0: Health Risk Assessment – Comprehensive evaluation of employees’ health risks.
items.1: Employee Medical Check Up – Routine health screening for early detection.
items.2: Smart Report MCU – Integrated digital reports for health monitoring.
items.3: Corporate Managed Care – Effective management of employee healthcare services.
items.4: Genomic Test for Productivity – Genetic analysis to optimize work potential.
items.5: Nutrigenomic & Healthy Food – Nutrition recommendations based on genetic profiles.
items.6: In-house Clinic – On-site company clinic for direct healthcare services.

manajemenLayanan.title: Corporate Health Service Management
manajemenLayanan.body: Employee health management tailored to company needs, as a follow-up to health screening or MCU results. This service includes:

items.0: Clinic Services: Doctor consultations, vitamin & vaccine administration, nutrition counseling, and psychologist consultations.
items.1: Wellness Programs: Exercise classes (aerobics/yoga/zumba), body composition monitoring, health education sessions (health talks), and health coaching via WhatsApp groups.

medicalCheck.title: Employee Medical Check Up
medicalCheck.body: An integrated employee health examination service that includes clinic and laboratory services tailored to corporate needs. We provide laboratory tests, digital health reports (individual and company), doctor consultations, and vitamin and vaccine administration as part of a comprehensive health solution for employees.

klinikPerusahaan.title: On-site Company Clinic / In-house Clinic
klinikPerusahaan.body: Development of an internal company clinic customized to corporate needs to support employee productivity and foster a healthy work environment. Facilities include professional medical staff (doctors/nurses), complete clinic management (equipment & logistics), an integrated clinic system with electronic medical records, lab ordering, individual health risk score reports, consultations, and customer service support.

manajemenHero.title: Clinical Laboratory Management
manajemenHero.body: Diagnos Laboratory is here to meet public needs with a clear vision and mission to realize a healthier Indonesia.

labTypes.title: Types of Services at Diagnos Clinical Laboratory
labTypes.body: We provide a comprehensive range of examinations, supported by quality facilities and human resources for reliable results. Our test types include Hematology, Chemistry, Immunoserology, Urine – Stool – Body Fluids, Microbiology, Anatomical Pathology, Genomics, Clinic Services & Miscellaneous, Test Packages, Molecular, Blood Bank, Hemostasis, Toxicology, Therapeutic Drug Monitoring.

labServices.heading: Diagnos Clinical Laboratory Services
labServices.subheading: Diagnos Clinical Laboratory Management offers integrated solutions for managing, maintaining, and improving the quality of laboratory services efficiently and accurately.

0.title: Hematology
0.body: Laboratory tests to evaluate blood cells and their components, and to detect abnormalities in the production, structure, and function of blood cells.

1.title: Hemostasis
1.body: Laboratory tests to detect disorders in blood coagulation function and a tendency for bleeding.

2.title: Chemistry
2.body: Laboratory tests to measure levels of various analytes that reflect organ function in the body.

3.title: Urine–Stool–Body Fluids
3.body: Assessment of macroscopic (and chemical) parameters in body-fluid samples to determine health status, detect infections, digestive disorders, and the function of the kidneys and urinary tract.

4.title: Molecular
4.body: Examinations using advanced technology to analyze and detect biological markers related to genes, cells, and infectious agents.

5.title: Immunoserology
5.body: Assessment of immune function to detect cancer, infections, inflammation, and organ disorders.

6.title: Microbiology
6.body: Identification and characterization of microorganisms through culturing, staining, antibiotic susceptibility profiling, and microscopic analysis.

7.title: Anatomical Pathology
7.body: Analysis of tissue and cell samples to detect and confirm abnormalities or disease.

8.title: Genomics
8.body: Genomic testing to understand an individual’s genetic condition and the likelihood of inheriting genetic disorders.

9.title: Toxicology
9.body: Toxicology testing to detect exposure to toxic substances, illicit drugs, or chemicals in the body.

10.title: Therapeutic Drug Monitoring
10.body: Tests to measure specific drug levels in the blood to ensure proper dosing, therapeutic effectiveness, and to prevent side effects.

11.title: Test Packages
11.body: Bundles of comprehensive tests to assess overall health according to specific needs (male/female, age group, special conditions).

12.title: Blood Bank
12.body: A hospital service unit responsible for ensuring a safe, high-quality, and adequate blood supply for transfusions.

13.title: Clinic Services & Miscellaneous
13.body: Supporting health services such as vaccinations, vitamin infusions/injections, doctor consultations, as well as non-laboratory procedures including radiology, echocardiography (ECG), ultrasound, treadmill tests, spirometry, and audiometry.

homecareHero.title: Homecare Service
homecareHero.body: Your time matters — and so does your family’s health. Diagnos brings professional medical services straight to your home, delivering convenience, comfort, and safety to support your healthy, active lifestyle.

homecareInfo.title: What is Diagnos Homecare?
homecareInfo.body: Diagnos Homecare lets you get tested without leaving home. Contact us, and our professional team will come to collect your samples. It’s easy, safe, and comfortable.

homecareBenefit.title: What are the benefits of using Diagnos Homecare?
homecareBenefit.body: Diagnos Homecare guarantees comfortable and safe service at your home with peace of mind.

card1.title: Practical & Time-Saving
card1.desc: No queues, no travel — just contact us and our team will come to your location.

card2.title: Comfort of Your Home
card2.desc: Examinations are done in a familiar environment, helping you feel calmer and more relaxed.

card3.title: Safe & Hygienic Process
card3.desc: Strict health protocols are applied on every visit to ensure your family’s safety.

card4.title: Professional Medical Team
card4.desc: Handled by trained and experienced staff, according to Diagnos service standards.

card5.title: Trusted Test Results
card5.desc: Your samples are processed in Diagnos laboratories with high accuracy and modern technology.

homecareHowTo.title: How do I book the Home Care service?
homecareHowTo.subtitle: Make the most of our home care service: contact us and schedule a visit. Diagnos’s professional medical team will come to your home.

s2.title: Customer service schedules your homecare via the nearest Diagnos branch

s3.title: Make the payment via bank transfer

s4.title: Our home care team arrives according to the agreed schedule

genomikHero.title: Diagnos Genomics — DNAnswer
genomikHero.body: DNAnswer is a service from Diagnos Genomics designed to detect changes in your genes and chromosomes. With cutting-edge technology and high quality standards, we are committed to delivering genetic test results that are accurate, reliable, and help you make more personal, well-targeted health decisions.

items.0: Helps you understand your health condition and your family’s
items.1: Provides an overview of your personal health risks
items.2: Enables your doctor to give personalized medical advice based on your health profile
items.3: Powered by advanced technologies such as NGS, Microarray, and PCR for accurate, trustworthy results

tesLaboratoriumHero.title: Laboratory Tests
tesLaboratoriumHero.body: Health assessments using blood, urine, or other body fluids that can be used for screening, aiding disease diagnosis, monitoring disease progression, and determining prognosis.

pemeriksaanHero.title: Health Check Packages
pemeriksaanHero.body: Our checkup packages offer comprehensive and integrated health tests, making it easier for you to get a complete picture of your body and detect various conditions early.

pemeriksaanPaket.title: Checkup Packages & Thematic Panels
pemeriksaanPaket.body: Diagnos Laboratories offers Checkup Packages and Thematic Panels that include a complete set of tests to assess overall health. Tailored to specific needs such as Premarital Screening, Pregnancy Packages, Cancer Screening, Organ Function, Medical Check-Up, and disease risk detection. These packages make it easy to obtain accurate, consolidated results in a single testing flow—ideal for routine monitoring as well as early detection.

keberlanjutanHero.title: CSR & Sustainability Programs
keberlanjutanHero.body: The implementation of Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) has become an essential part of business sustainability. The Company recognizes that every achievement is inseparable from the support of many stakeholders—employees, the community, and the surrounding environment.

csrListProgram.title: Sustainability
csrListProgram.heading: CSR & Sustainability Programs
csrListProgram.subheading: Our commitment to contributing to society through CSR programs and sustainability initiatives for a healthier and more prosperous future.
